SEARCH
Package app.network

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
app.network.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
This class is used to handle all the clients input and outputs. The static methods are used to send and recieve messages to all clients. The instance methods are used to send and recieve messages to just one client.
